item.title: Deputy shoots accused kidnapper in Gainesville shopping center

item.description: Some changes are underway on Sunshine state interstates that lawmakers hope will make traveling a little less stressful.

item.title: Beach & Boating Forecast Sunday
item.description: Rip currents can develop with westerly winds, so watch the flags at lifeguard stations

item.description: Gainesville Police Department responded to a shooting early Saturday morning.

item.title: New Florida laws expand access to care for children with disabilities
item.description: More than a million children in the state are living with some form of disability

item.description: Keep an eye to the sky and be prepared to go indoors if thunder and lightning flare up
